text: mariyu (o pravakta!) Memu i granthanni nipai satyanto avatarimpajesamu. Idi purva granthalalo migili unna satyanni dhrvaparustundi. Mariyu vatilo unna satyasatyalanu pariskaristundi. Kavuna nivu, allah avatarimpajesina i sasanam prakaram vari madhya tirpu ceyyi. Mariyu ni vaddaku vaccina satyanni vidici vari korikalanu anusarincaku. Milo prati okka sanghaniki oka dharmasasananni mariyu oka jivana marganni niyaminci unnamu. Okavela allah talucukunte, mim'malni anta oke oka sanghanga rupondinci undevadu. Kani miku iccina danito (dharmanto) mim'malni pariksincataniki (ila cesadu). Kavuna miru manci panulu ceyatanlo okarito nokaru poti padandi. Allah vaddake mirandaru maralipovalasi vundi. Appudu ayana mikunna bhedabhiprayalanu gurinci miku teliyajestadu
